data.title: Border wait times: United States to Canada - 28 busiest land crossings
data.meta_description: Estimated wait times for crossing the Canada-United States land border at certain locations
data.text:
Plan ahead by checking current estimated wait times at 28 of Canada's busiest land border crossings.

On this page

Current border wait times

Other websites for border wait times

Service standards

Related links

Current border wait times

This table shows border crossings geographically from East to West. It includes border wait times, which are updated at least hourly. These wait times are estimates and could vary due to many factors like drug and firearm seizures, major events and holiday visitors.

For the latest wait times, make sure to refresh this page.

Service standards

The CBSA has established service standards for traveller and commercial wait times. For more information, visit Service standards: Fiscal year 2023 to 2024.
